lenders.name: John and Helen
lenders.occupation: Loans for livestock or sewing projects
lenders.loan_because: we believe that the poor need to be empowered to make a living of their choice.  We believe in sustainability and transformational development as the mode.   It's awesome to see  joy on their faces when THEY realize they can succeed.  There's nothing quite like it to see them realize that they are supporting their families through their own effort and no longer rely on "hand-outs" or doing without.
lenders.occupational_info: We visit small, rural communities in Nicaragua weekly - create relationships - find what talents and resources they have - and inquire what they would like to do to become sustainable.  Then we help them gather what they need, provide a loan, and continue to encourage them as they begin to repay it.  We enjoy seeing their lives transformed!

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I want to do whatever little we can to make a positive difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.occupation: small business owner, college professor, pastor

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I feel I can make a positive difference in someones life
lenders.occupational_info: i am part owner of a company that sells industrial equipment

lenders.name: Bronwen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help decrease WorldSuck. I also like knowing where my money goes to and seeing the results of my loans is amazing!

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell cosmetic raw materials to small businesses and hobbyists.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because:
I'm an entrepreneur at heart...I love the thought of someone making something from nothing, of turning that "sow's ear" into that "silk purse"...I love the thought of people working towards bettering their position in life, rather than accepting a handout.  " Give a (wo)man a fish, and he/she'll eat for a day, teach a (wo)man to fish and he/she will eat for life.  Let's help create more 'fisherpeople' in the world together! 

I have a soft spot for retail entrepreneurs because those are the people I work with every day in my job.
lenders.occupational_info: I distribute pc and macintosh computer software, computer games, computer accessories and video game accessories to retail stores all across Canada.

lenders.name: sam
lenders.loan_because: I respect people using their entrepreneurial abilities to better their lives and those of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I ensure that property assets are performing well and that the money spent on enhancing them is used effectively.  I also sell products online.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach biology at a small liberal arts college, and study reptiles and amphibians

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe responsible peer to peer social capitalism is one road that will lead to world trust and peace. I want to be an ever increasing part of that mission. Kiva provides me with one method of doing so!

lenders.name: Hans-Georg
lenders.loan_because: I have to support the poorer people in the world. It was a great luck to be born in the first world.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: I want people to feel better and not suffer in this world
lenders.occupational_info: Working on helping people find a balance as to their health on the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual level

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help people raise food for their own communities and be able to get an education.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who have faced oppression and need a helping hand to become independent.
lenders.occupational_info: Working globally to communicate with others to find opportunities to help through the written word or by connecting with other organizations such as KIVA where a larger good can be leveraged.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: it's fun to be able to help make a difference in places I may never see and in the lives of people I will probably never meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom, a grandmom,a pastor in the United Church of Christ. and a Seeing Eye puppy raiser!

lenders.name: Bobbi
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I like  the idea of helping someone along the path of their dreams by offering them  gentle encouragement.   Micro loans are a way of saying, "I believe in you.  You can do it."
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand tax laws and how the law impacts the choices they make when they earn, spend, and invest.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people a little bit at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: As a planner I'm involved with many projects that have a county-wide impact. I help determin if the impacts are good or bad.

lenders.name: Anam
lenders.loan_because: otherwise I'd spend it on drugs.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: God has given me so much and I wanna share some of that with people who need it more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: it is a good idea to help other people to help themselves

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It seems I can help lots of people with minimal risk.
lenders.occupational_info: Boring federal work. You try managing federal employees!

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.loan_because: I want to..

lenders.loan_because: I think it's a really amazing way to sustainably help people. Kiva rocks!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers as a manager and a coder.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a climate scientist

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I get such a great return on so little.
lenders.occupational_info: Residential construction

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro-loans will be the key factor in creating independence in developing nations - ending "aid" from developed nations which fuels corruption and lack of self-esteem.  It will change the world.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: saving trees, organizing others to save trees, stoping evil.

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: I've never seen a more succinct method of reaching out to help people directly...
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and writer, I paint in oil paints, write short stories and film scripts. I work at various other "normal" jobs to pay the rent, while I "do" art and "philosophize" ;)

lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have an opportunity to have a decent life.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and care for my house and family, and volunteer in several groups.

lenders.occupational_info: i work as a cook in restaurant.

lenders.loan_because: It's important to help families around the world grow and prosper.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: There are people trying to make a difference, trying to help themselves and others as well, but it's never that simple. I want to make just a bit easier for them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am primarily a student, in high school, planning on going to college. I also have a part-time job making pizzas at a pizzeria

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower people and allow them to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a before and after school child care program, which means that I work with kids ranging in age from 5 to 12 all day.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and that everyone should be given a chance to obtain their life goals.  Kiva is a great organization that makes this happen.

lenders.name: Melaina
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help. If I can help one person make their life better then I feel privileged to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make books and articles easier to read; I ensure that all of the information is accurate in content and correct in grammar and style.

lenders.name: Sue & Ric
lenders.loan_because: I started my business with a small loan and was consided high risk. If it was not for that loan, I would not be where I am. I want to help other accompish their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I put picture and infofmation on paper. this help them sell there products.

lenders.name: Dena
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because:
As a female I picture myself in another female’s shoe. 
In every country the hardship of being a female is sometimes a burden. I feel the Adversity of all the women who are trying hard to provide for her family. I feel that god put every individual for a mission. As much as I want to give, I can only give as much as I can.  Bless
lenders.occupational_info: People like me are seeking to lend a hand out as much as they can.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I have been in the situation of needing only a little bit of money.  Trying to get it from traditional sources is challenging and has large financial consequences.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and support the servers and technology within the company.

lenders.name: dina
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a bit of help at one time or another
lenders.occupational_info: i teach people about art

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
I'm an entrepreneur.

Being in business for oneself is empowering.

Skills learned in business are life skills.

Building a successful business takes commitment, dedication, and a drive to succeed.

Being successful in business creates dignity, self-esteem and most importantly, options.

lenders.name: Lisa & Mark
lenders.occupational_info: Mark is a self employed carpenter.  Lisa works in a public school library.  Charlie, Cedric and Annamarie are students.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: of the peace it brings to my soul. Though my struggles may be different from these entrepreneurs, the internal journey is the same. We all want to be at peace. We all want to be happy. My hope is that my loans empower these individuals to empower themselves. I am constantly inspired.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.  There are so many good people that just need someone to believe in them and give them an opportunity.  I think Kiva is wonderful and allows people to follow their dreams and keep their pride.  My initial loan has paid back more than 10 fold and allows me to reloan every time a monthly payment comes in.  Kiva is also a great opportunity to have a direct positive impact on someone else's life and a wonderful opportunity to get your children involved in giving.  It really helps them realize how fortunate they are.  I let them read bios and pick out who they would like to loan money to.  They can see first hand how many people their loans can help and when their loans are paid back, they can select another individual to loan to.
lenders.occupational_info: Be the change you want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.occupational_info: Soy estudiante

lenders.name: Sher
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to show appreciation for the opportunities I've had.
lenders.occupational_info: I write instructions for how to do things, like use machinery or computer software.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: A life centered on yourself isn't worth living.

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because: Because? I guess it's because $25 can do a lot more for some people than sitting in my bank account doing nothing.
lenders.occupational_info: What work?  Helping people is a hobby

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others world wide who are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: teacher

lenders.name: Janna

lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of 5, step-mother to 7 and grandma to 7 going on 17 and we are soon to adopt 3 more!  It is a job just to keep in touch with all these wonderful people, although most of them don't live at home now.

lenders.name: Wesley

I also believe that every person is loved by God and those of us who can, should help others when possible through a kind word, deed, or finances.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker who works in health care with persons who need assistance obtaining economic resources, counseling, and assitance in coping with a medical crisis.  I have done work with dying persons for over 10 years at a local  hospice.

lenders.name: gaspar
lenders.loan_because: i love seeding higher consciousness
lenders.occupational_info:
So who in the world is Gaspar the MagiStar ?

Long before he was old enough to design architecture or work with holographic media, Gaspare Grillo had a profound desire to transform the way we experience our world. For the last couple of decades he has been immersed in the development of super-learning environments.  Formal training in architecture laid the foundation for advancements into the realms of multi-media, virtual reality and floatation environments. With his focus on the science of sacred geometry, Gaspare branched out to open new realms in stargate technology, performing arts and alchemy activations. These talents have now converged into the creation of a revolutionary media matrix immersion theatre. Together with his partner KA’ryna SH’ha and an extraordinary alliance of artists, they are opening new realms in the worlds of entertainment & education that will dramatically shift the way we experience media in the coming years…. 

A master of ceremonies and producer of numerous events, Gaspare's achievements in the entertainment industry include opportunities to work with some of the finest leaders in the business. As president of Celestial Celebrations {  iamastarseed.com }, he created the “World Famous StarSeed Wishes” and represents some of the most talented mystical entertainers in Canada. He continues to re-invent the art of performance and staging with tools & techniques that inspire event & meeting planners, entertain guests and deliver lasting impressions. Gaspare is a wizard of integrated media and it’s potential for transforming consciousness. He loves to share his expertise for filtering out distractions and getting to the core of his clients needs.

Gaspare’s passion for all life on earth makes him a living ambassador for thinking globally and acting locally. Through a process of dynamic systems integration, he has already made dramatic differences in the lives of those who cross paths with his ideas.  Gaspare’s intent has always been to produce the maximum results for the most people with a minimum investment of time, money and resources.

lenders.loan_because: soli Deo gloria

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: We all need a hand up now and then.

lenders.occupational_info: Sharon owns and operates a womens' clothing store.  Sandes is an camera assistant in the television and film industries.

lenders.name: Don Norman
lenders.loan_because: giving makes me smile.  Also, I enjoy repetitive tasks and helping first one person and then another with the same dollar is sweet.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently exploring modes of living

lenders.name: Edmund
lenders.loan_because: I want to share in a little way some of the blessings that have come to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help high school students who are having trouble understanding chemistry in a one-on-one setting.

lenders.name: KRISTI Czap
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel more hopeful and less powerless to know that individuals can support positive change on a worldwide stage.

lenders.name: JoE
lenders.loan_because: It is a great opportunity to help those less fortunate than us. Even the smallest loan can help in a big way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer, I'm very art-centered and hope to work for a creative firm some day.

lenders.name: Jake
lenders.loan_because: it's empowering.
lenders.occupational_info: I help plan the development and growth of communities.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: "The health of the planet is affected by the health of every individual on it."

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: God says treat my neighbor's as I would want to be treated. I loan becouse my heart knows its right! And I thank GOD for that.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my days Planting new flowers, trees and making the world a little greener. And I come home with a smile every day!

lenders.name: Marvin
lenders.loan_because: I am not a rich person but what little I have God has shown me to share it.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for a Telecumnications Company but I consider it my hoby, my true passion is economics and writing.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: small efforts by large numbers of people will make a difference.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because:
"It is easier to have faith that God will support each House of Hospitality and Farming Commune and supply our needs in the way of food and money to pay bills, than it is to keep a strong, hearty, living faith in each individual around us - to see Christ in him."
-Dorothy Day

lenders.name: EI MIYAMOTO
lenders.loan_because: I can feel my $25 would surely contribute to someone's life which is totally unknown to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a grad student majoring sociology of development. Now I am writing a Master’s thesis concerning kiva. In this summer I went to Ghana, a middle-sized country in Western Africa, to do field work concerning the research. I succeeded in interviewing some staffs in a microfinance institution and the borrowers to find the actualities of the financial project. After I returned to Japan, I also had some opportunities to talk to a couple of lenders on kiva in order to understand their feeling and intention to lend money to unknown people across the internet.

lenders.name: NELSON KIVUTI
lenders.loan_because: I need to expand an applied technology training school that I have just started. Im married and do computer repairs and the money isnt enough for the basic needs and the expansion of this venture.
lenders.occupational_info: I intend to eradicate poverty in african continent by training people in courses that make them self sufficient eg. Making lotions from locally available materials, making of paints, making of sweets, waste management: recycling, food processing to avert the global food crisis.
